name: 14.04-Fastx tool kit: FASTQ quality chart
description: Generates a solexa quality score box-plot graph

parameters.name: Input
parameters.description: Input file. Should be the output of 'solexa_quality_statistics' program

parameters.name: Output
parameters.description: Output file name. default is STDOUT

parameters.name: Title
parameters.description: Title (usually the solexa file name) - will be plotted on the graph

parameters.name: Output .PS
parameters.description: Generate PostScript (.PS) file. Default is PNG image

parameters.name: Help
parameters.description: See the usage of the tool
